about_the_game:
"Did you know that the capybara is the largest rodent in the world?

Now that size is not enough. Capybarabarabarabarabarabara can grow bigger than a giraffe!
Let's work together!"

Capybarabara is a 2D stacker game where you rotate and drop capybaras of various shapes to build the highest tower. Try different strategies and test your precise control in two modes!

- Stacking Mode: Carefully stack capybaras on the given platforms. The game is over when the capybaras fall down. Stack the capybaras as high as you can.

- Time Attack Mode: The giraffe, the rival of the capybara, has a neck that keeps growing longer. The capybara can't be bigger than the giraffe, but the capybarabarabarabarabarabarabara can! The capybara tower must always be higher than the giraffe. Try to outrun the giraffe and remain the tallest animal for as long as possible.

Capybarabara is full of cute visuals and charming capybara characters, and is the perfect game for players who want light but challenging gameplay. Can you stack capybara towers and become taller than a giraffe? Feel the charm of capybara and take on the challenge!

name: Capybarabara

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Capybara's great challenge to reach high into the sky!It's time to build the tallest capybara tower.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
